Service.name: Family Support Services
Service.description: Services that provide assistance to families, including counseling, financial aid, and social integration support.

Service.name: Medical Assistance
Service.description: Services that provide medical support, including consultations, treatments, and access to healthcare facilities.

Service.name: Financial Aid for Medical Expenses
Service.description: Financial assistance provided to cover medical expenses, including treatments, medications, and hospital stays.

Service.name: Student Support Services
Service.description: Support services for students, including counseling, academic guidance, and access to resources.

Service.name: Scholarship Programs
Service.description: Programs that provide financial assistance to students in the form of scholarships or grants.

Service.name: Student Housing
Service.description: Housing services specifically designed for students, including dormitories and other accommodation options.

Service.name: Public Health Monitoring
Service.description: Services that monitor public health issues, including disease outbreaks and health trends, to ensure community well-being.

Service.name: Employment Rights Advocacy
Service.description: Services that advocate for workers' rights, ensuring fair treatment and protection under labor laws.

Service.name: Prisoner Support Services
Service.description: Services that provide support to prisoners, including legal aid, counseling, and reintegration programs.

Service.name: Rehabilitation Programs
Service.description: Programs aimed at rehabilitating individuals, including prisoners, through education, training, and therapy.

Service.name: Legal Advocacy for Prisoners
Service.description: Legal services that advocate for the rights of prisoners, ensuring fair treatment and access to justice.

Service.name: Child Protection Services
Service.description: Services designed to protect children from abuse, neglect, and exploitation, ensuring their safety and well-being.

Service.name: Legal Advocacy for Children
Service.description: Legal services that advocate for the rights of children, ensuring their protection and access to justice.
